attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Automatic contract renewal
 

Common public will almost certainly forget, after a year, that they had consented to this renewal of contract. If price has changed or circumstances has changed, for any party involved, than this renewed contract should be considered not valid. Unless new consent taken before each renewal 

i.e.   BT , house insurance, car insurance,  sky TV, virgin TV, phone, mobile, contract by default with banks,

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
